lead_paragraph: The lead producer of the Broadway production of “Ragtime” said the musical revival, which had been scheduled to close on Sunday, will instead run for one additional week.
snippet: The lead producer of the Broadway production of “Ragtime” said the musical revival, which had been scheduled to close on Sunday, will instead run for one additional week.

byline.original: By PATRICK  HEALY; Compiled by JULIE BLOOM
